author: soar777

text:
I bought this game the minute I saw it at Gamestop like...a week after it first dropped.  And now all I hear about is that it's so hard to find.

You know what I say?  Wait it out, you might just find that reprint.  I would have been shit out of luck if that reprint of Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney 1 never happened.  I never would have experienced my favorite game series ever.  Or took gaming seriously afterwards.

Same with one of my favorite RPGs ever...Radiant Historia.
